name: Matthew Brehmer
content: Matthew Brehmer | Cheriton School of Computer Science | University of Waterloo Skip to main content Matthew Brehmer Assistant Professor Contact Information matthew.brehmer@uwaterloo.ca Location: DC 1310 Groups Professors, Faculty Links Link to personal webpage: https://mattbrehmer.ca/ Additional Information Degrees PhD, University of British Columbia (2016) MSc, University of British Columbia (2011) BComp, Queen's University (2009) Research interests Matt is a human-computer interaction (HCI) and data visualization researcher interested in ubietous information experiences: he designs, implements, and evaluates new ways to communicate and collaborate around data.
